casebody.data:
PERCY LIPMAN, PROSECUTOR, v. BOARD OF EDUCATION OF THE CITY OF BAYONNE, DEFENDANT. Argued January term, 1928 Decided July 2, 1928.

*707Before Justices Parker, Minturn and Campbell.

For the prosecutor, Brenner & Kresch. For the defendant, Benny & Cruden. Per Curiam.

Eor the reason stated in the opinion filed in number 295, this term, involving substantially the same question, the writ in this case will be dismissed.
